milestones.title: Milestone M1 - Analysis & Design Complete
milestones.description: Complete all analysis, design, and planning activities. Finalize requirements, create system architecture, and establish governance framework.

milestones.title: Milestone M2 - Core Identity & Wallet Foundations
milestones.description: Implement core mobile wallet functionality including DID generation, VC storage, VP creation, and secure key management.

milestones.title: Milestone M3 - Issuance, Verification & Trust Registry
milestones.description: Develop backend issuance and verification services with trust registry implementation.

milestones.title: Milestone M4 - Zero-Knowledge Proofs & Selective Disclosure
milestones.description: Integrate ZKP framework and implement privacy-preserving selective disclosure features.

milestones.title: Milestone M5 - Integration, Testing & Hardening
milestones.description: Complete end-to-end integration testing, security validation, and defect resolution.

milestones.title: Milestone M6 - Documentation, Final Review & Submission
milestones.description: Complete all documentation, final report, and prepare for project submission and demonstration.

epics.title: [EPIC] Requirements Finalization
epics.description: Finalize and validate all functional and non-functional requirements with locked acceptance criteria.

tasks.title: Finalize functional requirements (FR table validation)
tasks.description: Review and validate all functional requirements in F-requirements.csv. Ensure each requirement has clear acceptance criteria and is properly categorized.

tasks.title: Finalize nonfunctional requirements (NFR table validation)
tasks.description: Review and validate all non-functional requirements in NF-requirements.csv. Ensure measurable criteria and compliance standards are defined.

tasks.title: Confirm Zero-Trust enforcement assumptions
tasks.description: Document and validate all Zero-Trust security assumptions and enforcement mechanisms across the system architecture.

tasks.title: Lock acceptance criteria per feature
tasks.description: Define and lock acceptance criteria for all features to be implemented. Create traceability matrix.
acceptance_criteria: Acceptance criteria defined for all features

epics.title: [EPIC] System Architecture Design
epics.description: Design comprehensive system architecture including DID lifecycle, VC flows, trust registry, and mobile wallet architecture.

tasks.title: High-level system architecture diagram
tasks.description: Create comprehensive system architecture diagram showing all components, data flows, and integration points.

tasks.title: DID lifecycle and VC flow diagrams
tasks.description: Design detailed sequence diagrams for DID generation, VC issuance, and VP presentation workflows.

tasks.title: Trust registry / ledger simulation design
tasks.description: Design trust registry architecture and lightweight ledger simulation for issuer verification.

tasks.title: Mobile wallet architecture definition
tasks.description: Define comprehensive mobile wallet architecture including secure storage, key management, and offline capabilities.

epics.title: [EPIC] Governance & Planning
epics.description: Establish project governance framework, confirm agreements, and validate project structure.

tasks.title: Confirm client agreement alignment (1.4)
tasks.description: Review and confirm alignment with client agreement section 1.4 and all contractual obligations.

tasks.title: Align Appendix F SOW with project execution
tasks.description: Ensure Statement of Work in Appendix F aligns with project execution plan and deliverables.

tasks.title: Validate GitHub project structure
tasks.description: Ensure GitHub repositories are properly structured with appropriate issues, milestones, and labels.

epics.title: [EPIC] Mobile Wallet Core
epics.description: Implement core mobile wallet functionality for DID generation, VC storage, and VP creation.

tasks.title: Implement DID generation workflow
tasks.description: Implement DID generation using W3C standards with secure key generation in hardware-backed storage.

tasks.title: Implement VC storage model
tasks.description: Create secure local storage model for verifiable credentials with encryption and access controls.

tasks.title: Implement VP creation logic
tasks.description: Implement verifiable presentation creation with cryptographic signing and W3C compliance.

tasks.title: Local-first data storage setup
tasks.description: Set up local-first data architecture with offline capabilities and synchronization strategy.

epics.title: [EPIC] Secure Key Management
epics.description: Implement platform-specific secure key management using hardware-backed storage with biometric authentication.

tasks.title: iOS Secure Enclave key generation
tasks.description: Implement key generation and storage using iOS Secure Enclave with non-exportable keys.

tasks.title: Android Keystore key generation
tasks.description: Implement key generation and storage using Android Keystore StrongBox with non-exportable keys.

tasks.title: Non-exportable key enforcement
tasks.description: Ensure all cryptographic keys are non-exportable and hardware-bound across both platforms.

tasks.title: Biometric / device authentication binding
tasks.description: Implement biometric authentication with device PIN fallback for wallet access.

epics.title: [EPIC] Developer Enablement
epics.description: Evaluate and select appropriate SDKs and crypto libraries for DID/VC implementation.

tasks.title: SDK evaluation (Aries / DIDKit / Spruce)
tasks.description: Evaluate Aries, DIDKit, and Spruce SDKs for DID/VC implementation. Select best option for project needs.

tasks.title: Crypto library validation
tasks.description: Validate cryptographic libraries for W3C signature schemes and ZKP support.

epics.title: [EPIC] Backend Issuance Services
epics.description: Implement backend credential issuance services with schema validation and cryptographic signing.

tasks.title: Credential issuance API
tasks.description: Implement RESTful API for credential issuance with authentication and authorization.

tasks.title: Credential schema validation
tasks.description: Implement schema validation for verifiable credentials against defined templates.

tasks.title: Issuer key management
tasks.description: Implement secure key management for credential issuers with rotation and revocation support.

tasks.title: Credential signing logic
tasks.description: Implement W3C-compliant cryptographic signing for verifiable credentials.

epics.title: [EPIC] Verification Services
epics.description: Implement comprehensive verification services for VCs including signature verification, revocation checks, and replay protection.

tasks.title: VC signature verification
tasks.description: Implement cryptographic signature verification for verifiable credentials using W3C methods.

tasks.title: Revocation status checks
tasks.description: Implement revocation status checking against revocation lists with caching support.

tasks.title: Replay protection (nonce/timestamp)
tasks.description: Implement nonce-based or timestamp-based replay attack protection for all verification requests.

epics.title: [EPIC] Trust Registry / Ledger Simulation
epics.description: Implement trust registry and lightweight ledger simulation for issuer verification and offline validation.

tasks.title: Issuer registry design
tasks.description: Design and implement issuer registry for managing trusted credential issuers.

tasks.title: Hash-chain or lightweight ledger implementation
tasks.description: Implement hash-chain or lightweight ledger for tamper-evident credential tracking.

tasks.title: Local cache for offline verification
tasks.description: Implement local caching mechanism for offline credential verification support.

epics.title: [EPIC] ZKP Framework Integration
epics.description: Integrate zero-knowledge proof framework for privacy-preserving selective disclosure.

tasks.title: Evaluate zkSNARK / Noir / Gnark tooling
tasks.description: Evaluate zkSNARK, Noir, and Gnark frameworks for ZKP implementation. Select best option.

tasks.title: Define ZKP circuits for claims
tasks.description: Design and implement ZKP circuits for common credential claim types and selective disclosure.

tasks.title: Proof generation on mobile
tasks.description: Implement ZKP proof generation on mobile platforms with acceptable performance.

tasks.title: Proof verification on backend
tasks.description: Implement ZKP proof verification on backend services with high performance.

epics.title: [EPIC] Privacy Controls
epics.description: Implement privacy controls for selective disclosure and attribute minimization.

tasks.title: Selective disclosure rules
tasks.description: Implement selective disclosure rules allowing users to share only requested attributes.

tasks.title: Attribute minimization enforcement
tasks.description: Enforce attribute minimization principles to prevent over-sharing of user data.

tasks.title: ZKP failure handling
tasks.description: Implement proper error handling and fallback mechanisms for ZKP failures.

epics.title: [EPIC] Integration Testing
epics.description: Conduct comprehensive end-to-end integration testing across all system components.

tasks.title: Mobile ↔ Backend end-to-end flows
tasks.description: Test complete end-to-end workflows between mobile app and backend services.

tasks.title: Issuance → Storage → Presentation → Verification
tasks.description: Test complete credential lifecycle from issuance through verification.

tasks.title: Offline QR-based verification
tasks.description: Test offline verification scenarios using QR code-based VP sharing.

epics.title: [EPIC] Security Validation
epics.description: Conduct comprehensive security validation including threat modeling and penetration testing.

tasks.title: Threat modeling review
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive threat modeling exercise to identify and mitigate security risks.

tasks.title: Zero-Trust enforcement checks
tasks.description: Validate that Zero-Trust principles are properly enforced across all system components.

tasks.title: TLS and certificate pinning validation
tasks.description: Validate TLS 1.3 enforcement and certificate pinning implementation.

tasks.description: Triage all identified bugs and prioritize based on severity and impact.

tasks.title: Stability fixes
tasks.description: Resolve all critical and high-priority stability issues.

tasks.title: Performance tuning
tasks.description: Optimize system performance to meet all defined requirements.

tasks.description: Document complete system architecture with diagrams, data flows, and integration points.

tasks.title: Test suite documentation
